mapper.select: SELECT TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID , TB_MEMBER.EMAIL , TB_LOCAL.PASSWORD , TB_MEMBER.ROLE FROM TB_MEMBER INNER JOIN TB_LOCAL ON TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = TB_LOCAL.MEMBER_ID WHERE TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET NICKNAME = #{nickName}, PHONE = #{phone}, GENRE = #{genre}, EMAIL = #{email}, MBTI = #{mbti}, GENDER = #{gender} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
